com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs.list

Class ListTagHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs.list.ListTagHelper

  • public class ListTagHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Static helper class for the "new-style" list tag

        public static void bindSetDeclTo(java.lang.String listName,
                                 RhnSetDecl decl,
                                 ServletRequest request)
        Stores the declaration information of an rhnSet so as to be used by the list tag while rendering a set.
        Parameters:
        listName - name of list
        decl - the set declaration to bind
        request - current HttpServletRequest

                                 java.lang.String label,

        Stores the declaration information of an rhnSet so as to be used by the list tag while rendering a set.
        Parameters:
        listName - name of list
        label - the set declaration to bind
        request - current HttpServletRequest

      • lookupSetDeclFor

        public static java.lang.String lookupSetDeclFor(java.lang.String listName,
                                                ServletRequest request)
        Returns a set declaration associated to this list if it was previously bound.
        Parameters:
        listName - the name of the list to who holds the set. Note: this must be a Unique Name .. See bindSetDeclTo method for more info.
        request - the servlet request object
        Returns:
        returns the set declaration label associated to the list.

      • setSelectedAmount

        public static void setSelectedAmount(java.lang.String listName,
                                     int amount,
                                     HttpServletRequest request)
        Stores how many objects are selected for use by the list tag
        Parameters:
        listName - name of list
        amount - amount of items selected
        request - current HttpServletRequest

      • getPageNumber

        public static int getPageNumber(java.lang.String listName,
                                HttpServletRequest request)
        Gets the current page number for the named list This is zero based
        Parameters:
        listName - name of list
        request - active HttpServletRequest
        Returns:
        page number

      • getRadioSelection

        public static java.lang.String getRadioSelection(java.lang.String listName,
                                                 HttpServletRequest request)
        Returns the value of the selected radio button Applicable if you are using RadioColumnTag (rl:radiocolumn)
        Parameters:
        listName - name of list
        request - active HttpServletRequest
        Returns:
        string of the selected radio button or null

      • selectRadioValue

        public static void selectRadioValue(java.lang.String listName,
                                    java.lang.String selectionKey,
                                    HttpServletRequest request)
        Given a list and a value the following method preselects a value in the list. Applicable if you are using RadioColumnTag (rl:radiocolumn) So for example if you have a list of items and you have a selection key that uniquely identifies your item and you want that selected, you 'd call this method to preselect it...
        Parameters:
        listName - name of the list
        selectionKey - the selection key uniquely identifying the item to be selected.
        request - the active http request.

      • getSelected

        public static java.lang.String[] getSelected(java.lang.String listName,
                                             HttpServletRequest request)
        Returns the values of all selected checkboxes
        Parameters:
        listName - name of list
        request - active HttpServletRequest
        Returns:
        string array if items found, else null

      • getAll

        public static java.lang.String[] getAll(java.lang.String listName,
                                        HttpServletRequest request)
        Returns the values of all the row items in a given list This is useful for example in diff'ing between the result set and the selected items on a page.
        Parameters:
        listName - name of list
        request - active HttpServletRequest
        Returns:
        string array if items found, else null

      • getListAction

        public static java.lang.String getListAction(java.lang.String listName,
                                             HttpServletRequest request)
        Checks if any of the list actions were clicked like selectAll, unselectAll update set, pagination buttons (in which page_action will be returned).. etc and returns the appropriate value
        Parameters:
        listName - name of list
        request - active HttpServletRequest
        Returns:
        List Action if any of the list actions were selected null if not.

      • getFilterValue

        public static java.lang.String getFilterValue(ServletRequest request,
                                              java.lang.String uniqueName)
        returns the value that the list is being filtered upon. (null if not being filtered)
        Parameters:
        request - the request to look in
        uniqueName - the unique (hashed) name for the list
        Returns:
        the filter value

      • isParentAnElement

        public static boolean isParentAnElement(ServletRequest request,
                                        java.lang.String uniqueName)
        returns true if the list that is being filtered upon is allowed to to treat the parent as an element (always true for normal list)
        Parameters:
        request - the request to look in
        uniqueName - the unique (hashed) name for the list
        Returns:
        true if the parent can be treated as an element.

      • getObjectId

        public static java.lang.String getObjectId(java.lang.Object current)
        Returns the object id given an object deals with selectable/identifiable objects or uses hashcode for general
        Parameters:
        current - the current object
        Returns:
        the id representing the object

      • makeRowId

        public static java.lang.String makeRowId(java.lang.String listName,
                                         java.lang.Object current)
        Makes the tr row ids useful especially for expandable row renderers.
        Parameters:
        listName - the name of the list
        current - the object to be expanded on
        Returns:
        the row id value
